abstract: Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, will testify next week before the panel examining the causes of the deep financial crisis.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, will testify next week before the panel examining the causes of the deep financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, will testify next week before the panel examining the causes of the financial crisis, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Buffett and Moody’s Chief to Testify to Commission
